name: 陳謝鈞
objective:
本課程乃針對非英文系之大一學生開設，透過課堂英文教材與活動、課外指定讀本閱讀、以及線上自學練習，期有效提升英文字彙、文法及聽說讀寫能力、培養學生學習英文的習慣與興趣、以激發持續精進學術及職場英文能力。

The Freshman English course for non-English majors includes English teaching materials and activities, outside reading of assigned readers, and self-learning exercises in lab classrooms. It emphasizes mastery of fundamental skills of vocabulary, grammar, listening, speaking, reading and writing to cultivate students’ habits and interests in learning English, further inspiring them in advancing academic and workplace English abilities.
